H0.text: The legendary Hercules was said to have what quality. Courage

H1.text: The legendary Hercules was said to have what quality. Wisdom

H2.text: The legendary Hercules was said to have what quality. Agility

H3.text: The legendary Hercules was said to have what quality. Strength

A4.text: Hercules is famous for his strength and for his numerous far-ranging adventures.

A5.text: Hercules, who subdued and destroyed monsters, bandits, and criminals, was justly famous and renowned for his great courage.
